alert.note: Alert for Genesee; Niagara; Northern Erie; Southern Erie; Wyoming (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 1:42PM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT WYOMING...NORTHEASTERN ERIE... SOUTH CENTRAL NIAGARA AND GENESEE COUNTIES THROUGH 215 PM EDT... At 141 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strengthening thunderstorms along a line extending from near Woodlawn Beach State Park to Wales Center to near Letchworth State Park. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Buffalo, Cheektowaga, West Seneca, North Tonawanda, Clarence, Lackawanna, Batavia, Kenmore, Depew, Amherst, Tonawanda, Lancaster, East Aurora, Williamsville, Darien Lakes State Park, Grand Island, Elma, Marilla, Le Roy, and Pembroke. This includes Interstate 90 between exits 47 and 56. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
